data.comment: Kick-off has been delayed.
The match has started at Inter Miami CF Stadium.
In the minute 2, Miami's Julian Carranza misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Nashville goal kick.
Nima Saghafi signals a free kick to Nashville in their own half.
In the minute 4, Throw-in Miami.
Goal kick for Nashville at Inter Miami CF Stadium.
Throw-in for Nashville at Inter Miami CF Stadium.
In the minute 7, Nima Saghafi awards the home team a throw-in.
Miami are pushing forward but Rodolfo Pizarro's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Fort Lauderdale.
In the minute 9, Ball safe as Nashville is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Miami in their own half.
Miami awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 11, Free kick for Miami in their own half.
Free kick for Miami in their own half.
Nashville have a goal kick.
In the minute 14, Miami's Nicolas Figal is on target but unsuccessful.
Nima Saghafi awards Miami a goal kick.
Nima Saghafi awards Miami a goal kick.
In the minute 17, Nashville awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Nashville awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Fort Lauderdale a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 19, Throw-in for Miami in their own half.
Nima Saghafi signals a free kick to Miami in their own half.
Anibal Godoy (Nashville) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 20, Free kick for Miami in the half of Nashville.
Miami are coming forward and Rodolfo Pizarro gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Nashville at Inter Miami CF Stadium.
In the minute 21, Free kick Miami.
Throw-in high up the field for Miami in Fort Lauderdale.
Nima Saghafi signals a free kick to Nashville in their own half.
In the minute 23, Nima Saghafi signals a free kick to Nashville.
Nashville drives forward and Dominique Badji gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Nima Saghafi awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 25, Nashville's Hany Mukhtar gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Fort Lauderdale.
Miami to take a throw-in in Nashville territory.
In the minute 26, In Fort Lauderdale a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in Nashville.
Throw-in for Miami in the half of Nashville.
In the minute 28, Can Nashville get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Miami's half?
In Fort Lauderdale Nashville attack through Hany Mukhtar. The finish is off target, however.
Miami have a goal kick.
In the minute 30, Ball safe as Nashville is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Nashville in their own half.
Miami pushes forward through Lewis Morgan, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 37, Nashville awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Nashville goal kick.
Corner awarded to Nashville.
In the minute 40, Nashville have been awarded a corner by Nima Saghafi.
Randall Leal for Nashville gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Fort Lauderdale.
In the minute 41, Nashville have a dangerous throw-in.
Goal kick for Miami at Inter Miami CF Stadium.
Free kick Miami.
In the minute 44, Throw-in for Miami at Inter Miami CF Stadium.
The first-half has ended.
The second-half has started.
In the minute 46, Free kick for Nashville in the half of Miami.
Hany Mukhtar gets his shot on target but fails to score for Nashville.
At Inter Miami CF Stadium, Nashville are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 48, Nashville have a goal kick.
Nashville's Hany Mukhtar breaks free at Inter Miami CF Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Nima Saghafi awards Miami a goal kick.
In the minute 50, Nashville awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Miami goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 54, Nima Saghafi signals a free kick to Nashville.
Andres Reyes for Miami has been booked by Nima Saghafi and receives a first yellow card.
Robbie Robinson is replacing Julian Carranza for the home team.
In the minute 56, Miami have been awarded a corner by Nima Saghafi.
In Fort Lauderdale, Robbie Robinson (Miami) misses the target with a header.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Fort Lauderdale.
In the minute 58, Corner awarded to Miami.
Nima Saghafi signals a Nashville throw-in in Miami's half.
Hany Mukhtar of Nashville is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 61, Free kick for Miami in their own half.
The away team replace Randall Leal with Abu Danladi.
Taylor Washington is replacing Alex Muyl for Nashville at Inter Miami CF Stadium.
In the minute 63, In Fort Lauderdale a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Abu Danladi is booked for the away team.
Free kick for Miami in the half of Nashville.
In the minute 66, Can Miami get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nashville's half?
Can Miami capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Nashville's half?
In Fort Lauderdale Miami drive forward through Nicolas Figal. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 67, Nashville are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Nima Saghafi signals a free kick to Nashville.
Hany Mukhtar for Nashville gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 69, Ball goes out of play for a Miami goal kick.
The home team have replaced Victor Ulloa with Wil Trapp. This is the second substitution made today by Diego Alonso.
Brek Shea is on a sub for Nicolas Figal for Miami.
In the minute 71, Robbie Robinson (Miami) strikes at Inter Miami CF Stadium but his header is cleared.
Free kick Nashville.
Nashville make their third substitution with Daniel Rios replacing Dominique Badji.
In the minute 74, Corner awarded to Nashville.
Walker Zimmerman (Nashville) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
Throw-in Nashville.
In the minute 76, Nashville have been awarded a corner by Nima Saghafi.
Nashville advance rapidly upfield but Nima Saghafi blows for offside.
In Fort Lauderdale a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 79, Free kick Nashville.
Diego Alonso is making the team's fourth substitution at Inter Miami CF Stadium with Jay Chapman replacing Blaise Matuidi.
Diego Alonso (Miami) is making a fifth substitution, with Dylan Nealis replacing Lewis Morgan.
In the minute 80, Nashville's Daniel Lovitz breaks free at Inter Miami CF Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Nima Saghafi awards Miami a goal kick.
Throw-in for Nashville in the half of Miami.
In the minute 81, Throw-in for Miami at Inter Miami CF Stadium.
Can Miami capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Robbie Robinson of Miami gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 84, Goal kick for Nashville at Inter Miami CF Stadium.
Ball safe as Miami is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Important block from the Nashville defence as Brek Shea fires in a strike for Miami.
In the minute 85, Throw-in for Nashville in their own half.
Corner awarded to Nashville.
Dave Romney of Nashville smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 89, Attention is being given to Nashvilleâ€™s Walker Zimmerman and play has been suspended briefly.
Rodolfo Pizarro of Miami gets in a strike, but is off target.
Nashville have a goal kick.
Walker Zimmerman returns to the field for Nashville after picking up a slight injury.
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Nashville's Anibal Godoy is on target but unsuccessful.
Nashville have been awarded a corner by Nima Saghafi.
Miami have a goal kick.
Nashville to take a throw-in in Miami territory.
Nima Saghafi awards Miami a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Nima Saghafi blows to end the match. The final score is 0-0.
The away team replace Hany Mukhtar with Derrick Jones.
